summary:
Lore friendly-  I changed very little about her.  Main function is that you can give her ANY ARMOR that you see fit. 

SHE WILL LOOK LIKE YOUR MODEL ACCORDING TO YOUR INSTALLED MOD\'S
descriptionHtml:
(Caution every so often she may loose her clothes and walk around naked. Normally you can load a new room and she will re equip but there is be a chance that they may be removed from her inventory.)

I tried to leave her as close as possible to vanilla. Set her level cap to 100 (not tested past 46).  Changed default armor to none and add vanilla armor to her inventory.  Can now change her armor.

That\'s it very little very simple.  Hope you like it.  

Also this is my very first mod. 

There are no mod\'s required or armor included the armor show is in fact 

Succubus armor by Hentai
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15156 (NOT INCLUDED)

Simply used it to illustrate the point of the mod and was only armor in my inventory at the time. 

(Caution every so often she may loose her clothes and walk around naked. Normally you can load a new room and she will re equip but there is be a chance that they may be removed from her inventory.)
author: Noider
